text: "Caro" (stylized in upper case; English: "Expensive") is a song by Puerto Rican rapper Bad Bunny featuring vocals from Ricky Martin. The song was released through Rimas Entertainment, OVO Sound and Warner Bros. Records on December 24, 2018. ==Music video== The video was released on January 23, 2019. The video has about 150 million views on YouTube. The clip begins with Bad Bunny getting a quick manicure, and after a close-up of his nails, at that moment the trap singer is replaced by a girl, Puerto Rican model Jazmyne Joy, who looks like him, even with the same haircut. During the video, she acts just like Bad Bunny. ==Charts== ===Weekly charts=== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" ! scope="col"| Chart (2018–19) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- ! scope="row"| Argentina (Argentina Hot 100) | 64 |- |- |} ===Year-end charts=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text- align:center" ! scope="col"| Chart (2019) ! scope="col"| Position |- ! scope="row"| US Hot Latin Songs (Billboard) | 44 |} ==References== Category:2018 singles Category:2018 songs Category:Bad Bunny songs Category:Spanish-language songs Category:Songs written by Ricky Martin Category:Songs written by Bad Bunny
title: Caro (Bad Bunny song)
